title: Here's a list of what we should worry about economically for 2014!
contentencoded:
A business consultancy called the Eurasia Group each year asks its team of political scientists to predict the top things to worry about globally. 

David Gordon, Chairman and Head of Research, joins Marketplace Morning Report host David Brancaccio to discuss his list of global risks for 2014.

description: A look at the top financial and economic risks of 2014.
